title: AccessOne
name: AccessOne
brandDescription: Fiserv, Inc. is a global provider of payments and financial services technology solutions. The Company provides account processing and digital banking solutions, card issuer processing and network services, payments, e-commerce, merchant acquiring and processing, and the Clover cloud-based point-of-sale solution. The Company operates through three segments: Merchant Acceptance (Acceptance), Financial Technology (Fintech) and Payments and Network (Payments).

product.description: AccessOne APIs provide real-time access to our backend systems of record for boarding, inquiry, maintenance, and reporting.  These APIs are available for use by our full service processing ISO clients.
product.longDescription: AccessOne APIs provide real-time access to our backend systems of record for boarding, inquiry, maintenance, and reporting.  These APIs are available for use by our full service processing ISO clients.
